bootLines: [ERROR] You are not the Admin, you will be logged in as a limited guest user.

[ALERT] This is Vincenzo Oriti personal webpage for projects etc.
If youâ€™ve left your hacker hat at home or just want to set your adventure level to 'easy', just type startx in the console below to load a normal website. Alas, just so you know, not all content will be available in noob-mode
